> Nightstrike/Darkfate:
> 
> Nightstrike and Darkfate just arrived when battle started and they 
> were ready to support their fellows and opened fire againts the 
> enemie.

((OOC: I am going to assume that Nightstrike and Darkfate and firing
standard laser attacks this time. If you could, please define what
ordinance you are using so I know how to have Legacy respond. Thanks))
 
As the last two minions make thier way onto the battle field they are
scanned and targetted, even as they launch thier own attacks. 

Nightstrike and Darkfate's lasers reach through the air towards the
crimson and black hover tank. They strike! Thier twin attacks searing
along the dense armor of the craft, creating small scorched lines along
the exterior, but other wise leaving it remarkably unharmed. 

The tank on the other hand brought its twin mounted rear cannon to bear
on the duo and began a firing rapid plasma beam attacks into the air,
targetting thier wings and engiens!

Even as this happened, Decibel and Tummult both swung through the air
in wide arks, swiftly comming back around, thier engienes screaming as
they brought to bear thier firepower! Twin missiles, a full spread
launch from each of them and moved in the direction of Legacy!

The strike was tremendous, Tummult's ballistic missiles and Decibel's
sonic ones created a true cecophany of sound light and power. However
as the tank moved smoothly out from beneath the blast, the energy of
the attack sloughing off newly errected shields, it was obvious they
had underestimated this foe.

> ::Lord Elder::
>
> As the Maximal's Matrix Quest shuttle nears the Ark, Elder looks out 
> the view ports down at Mt. St. Hillary.
> Elder: We're late! There is a battle down there. Minions... I'm sure 
> of it.

As the Maximal craft came into range, the ship was scanned as the tank
below targetted it. After a short moment the targeting beams from the
tank switched focus, the shuttle is apparently being ignored. 

The Hover tank turned its attention to the minions in the air, firing
blasts at the dodging aircraft. 

Tummult continued his upward climb until he also saw the approaching
Maximals. A grunt and a sight escaped him as he saw thier chance for
success retreating from thier grasp. 

"Minions, RETREAT!" Tummult's deep voice transmitted over thier radios
on encrypted channels. "Thier are too many for us to take. Phobia, get
Deepstryke and get out of there!"

Tummult continued to climb as Phobia transformed and latched on to
Deepstryke with some sort of cable. Decibel grumbled and circled, but
only fired covering shots to aid thier escape from the tank below. 

(Tag Nightstrike, Darkfate and Maximals)

Preston
(Da'minions & Legacy)
